au.gov.ga.conn4d.output

Class ThreadWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.gov.ga.conn4d.output.ThreadWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ThreadWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Writes String items to an output file using a BlockingQueue
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadWriter(java.io.File file)
      Opens a ThreadWriter using a File object for the output file
      ThreadWriter(java.lang.String filename)
      Opens a ThreadWriter using a String representing the path of the output file

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Prepares the class for shutdown.
      void open()
      Starts the class running in its own Thread.
      void run()
      Keeps the class waiting to write submissions to the queue as long as it is not stopped, and there is something left to write.
      ThreadWriter write(java.lang.String s)
      Submits a String to the queue for writing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Prepares the class for shutdown. The Thread will be removed once the queue is empty.

      • open

        public void open()
        Starts the class running in its own Thread.

      • run

        public void run()
        Keeps the class waiting to write submissions to the queue as long as it is not stopped, and there is something left to write.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • write

        public ThreadWriter write(java.lang.String s)
        Submits a String to the queue for writing.
        Parameters:
        s - - a String to be written to to the output file.
